title: Clinical gene discovery program solves 30 medical mysteries

title_detail.value: Clinical gene discovery program solves 30 medical mysteries

summary: A table in a recently published paper tells the story of 30 families who have, sometimes after years of searching, finally received an answer about the condition that has plagued one or more family members.
